name: api-cypress
description: Proyecto API con Cypress y Javascript

scripts.test:report: npm run clean:reports && cypress run && npm run generate:report && npm run open:report
scripts.test:report:smoke: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --env grep=@smoke && npm run generate:report && npm run open:report
scripts.test:report:interfaz: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --env grep=@interfaz && npm run generate:report && npm run open:report
scripts.test:report:parametros: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --env grep=@parametros && npm run generate:report && npm run open:report
scripts.generate:report: npm run merge:reports && marge cypress/reports/consolidated-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --reportFilename consolidated-report --inline --charts --code
